summary: The module implements a 2:4 structured sparse tensor type and associated GPU‑accelerated operations, integrating with PyTorch’s dispatch system to provide efficient matrix multiplication, linear layers, and sparsification utilities, while also offering helper classes for forward/backward passes and straight‑through estimation.
business_intent: Enable deep‑learning workloads to run faster and use less memory by exploiting structured sparsity on modern GPUs, thereby improving inference and training performance for large models.
